specialTipSize.specialTip: $0’s wearer gains resistance against White damages. However, when O-05-102 was not in the facility, nothing happened.
$0 periodically healed the wearer’s mental health.
<Caution> Do not put $0’s wearer in the containment chamber of O-05-102.
<Caution> Be noted that when O-05-102 escapes, $0 also escapes. (It is confirmed that the same problem occurs even when an employee is wearing one of them.)
